name: Ball Breaker
description:
🎯 Precise Control, Endless Fun: Enjoy responsive, precise controls as you balls at hordes of bugs falling from the sky. Every throw is crucial, and every shot is a burst of adrenaline.


🐞 Bugs of All Types: Face off against bugs of all shapes and sizes, each with unique behaviors. Get ready to face waves of enemies and use strategy to take them down.

🕹️ Epic Boss Battles: Challenge giant bosses that will test your shooting skills and reflexes. Each boss is an epic battle with challenging attack patterns.



🔄 Dynamic In-Game Events: Be prepared for in-game events that happen suddenly and change the course of battle. Adapt to unexpected situations while facing the insects.

🌟 Minimalist Pixel Art Graphics: Immerse yourself in a stylized black and white world with captivating pixel art graphics. Every detail is designed to create a unique atmosphere.

🌠 Power-Up Combinations: Strategically mix power-ups to create impressive combos. Discover unique combinations that will help you face the hordes of insects and challenging bosses.
Get ready for an addictive and challenging experience in "Ball Breaker". Shoot, dodge, and dominate each level as you face endless waves of bugs and fearsome bosses. How many points can you score? How many bosses can you defeat? Find out now!
